quote_last: , and moved into first gear. He climbed off the bed, stripped off his clothes and threw them over a chair before going into the bathroom and taking a long shower.
title: Over My Dead Body
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: when a sixty-one-year-old Tibetan woman telephoned for a fire engine to put out a burning car.
title: My Name is Not Jacob Ramsay
author: Ben Trebilcook
